item.title: Writing is a difficult art...
item.description: Assorted list of all the old posts I used to write You can find these posts at my old blog.

item.title: Is the EU Democratic?
item.description: This is a blog post I wrote when I was in 7th grade on my first website. It was analysis of a video I watched called “Is the EU Democratic?

item.title: My Room
item.description: This is a blog post I wrote when I was in 6th grade on my first website. It is an ode to my room.

item.title: Vex Worlds Robotics Champions
item.description: This is a blog post that I wrote back in 5th grade on my first website. It is about the time I won the world championships in VEX Robotics.

item.title: Glad, I didnâ€™t give up
item.description: This is a blog post written by me when I was in 5th grade for my first website. It was about the time I lost my class presidential campaign.

item.title: The Time I Assembled a Computer
item.description: This is a blog post about the time I assembled a PC when I was the age of 10. This post was written in 5th grade for my first website.

item.title: Trip to Coloma
item.description: This is a blog post I wrote as a 4th grader on my first website It was a bright Monday morning and I woke up really excited knowing that I was going on a school field trip to Coloma to get gold.

item.title: Mighty Sands
item.description: This is a blog post I wrote when I was in 4th grade on my first website Hello everybody! Iâ€™ll be talking about a trip that I went to in the summer, 2015.

item.title: My outdoor education at Pigeon Point
item.description: This is a blog post I wrote when I was in 3rd grade on my first website. On May 14th, 2015, I went toÂ Pigeon PointÂ along with my class for the 3rd grade outdoor trip.
